website_summaries.verdict: Get pearly whites fast, even as quick as in one treatment.  Does as it says: it whitens and brightens teeth.
pros: Makes teeth 2-8 shades whiter in seven days
Ingredients are gluten-free, kosher, certified organic, sulfur-free, and paraben-free
Instructions are very easy to understand
Comes with two types of mouth trays
Doesn't hurt like whitening strips and doesn't make teeth feel weak afterward
cons: May burn gums and some users may find light and tray hard to use

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth are so white, they’ve started taking other people’s land!
customer_reviews.author: Roan Ricker

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved my smile, but lately I have not been as confident as before. I have been using CaliWhite teeth Whitening system for 3 days and I am amazed. I also use the CaliWhite Charcoal Toothpaste with the whitening system and let me say you need to purchase them together now!!!! I love my smile all over again!!! The picture speaks for its self.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the first tube for my my top teeth only and I see no difference whatsoever. They weren’t bad to begin with as I have used crest white strips for years. They weren’t as white as before so I bought this to get the white back instead of the CWS. Very disappointed and a waste of money. And it DOES make your teeth sensitive!
customer_reviews.author: KT@AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing and really works ♡
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing quality im suprised it worked especially with the price, i was so scared and skeptical since i have extremely sensitive teeth! I have done 10 min only and you can go longer each time, the first few times you feel like some stains were lifted and others werent , so you think it looks blotchy . Dont be scared its lifting the really bad stains first !! And the blotchiness you feel is there but goes away until the next treatment. It worked in 4 days, i saw the difference in my teeth. No photo shop needed ! Im continuing to use it and reordering refills :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela G ♡

customer_reviews.title: Uneven White Spots
customer_reviews.text: Weather you use the trays that you mold to your own teeth or the universal size, it's really difficult to keep the peroxide gel evenly distributed on your teeth while the trays are in your mouth. After each use I had really white spots around the edges of my teeth where the peroxide gel made the most contact. I was happy to see whitening but horrified that only parts of each tooth were white while other parts of each tooth were not. It looked like something was wrong with my actual teeth. It didn't cause any tooth sensitivity but I don't recommend this if you want an evenly whitened smile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and it works!
customer_reviews.text: It really does work one way or another. At first I only used one syringe (5times) and it didn't really give me the pearly white that I wanted but after contacting customer support, I was told to use it all with the custom mouth piece and I got much better results this time around! It's super affordable and doesn't hurt or make me feel uncomfortable at all besides a little bit of stinging after leaving it in my teeth for a while. But definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really write reviews, but this product is worth writing for. I saw immediate results after the very first use. I have sensitive gums and stopped using other products because it blistered them, but Cali White truly carries integrity in their products - this wasn’t the case with theirs. I am extremely happy with the results/product. As a matter of fact, 2 of my friends already purchased this product and have seen immediate results for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: It works better than anything I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Haven't even gone through a whole syringe yet!
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: To preface: I have used at home and dentist whitening kits before.. After using this I had to go to the doctors, I had blotchy red and white spots all over the inside of my mouth - even by following the instructions perfectly. I gave the kit to my doctor and they're going to analyze it for me to check for harmful levels of chemicals. Maybe it was a bad batch? Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating design not worth the end result
customer_reviews.text: I thought that the product whitened my teeth slightly and was easy enough to use. I got very frustrated with the mouthpiece of the set to the point where I wouldn't recommend to someone else. The universal tray has holes in it connecting the mouth and the part that holds the light. I drooled so much that it would collect in the edges causing the light to fall out multiple times per session. I wanted to do light multi-tasking (washing dishes, making my bed), but I would either drool on myself too randomly or the light would wiggle out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: NO CLUE
customer_reviews.text: I seriously have no clue what I'm doing wrong. not a single shade whiter and I'm almost through both tubes of cleaning gel. I do not smoke or drink coffee and nothing is helping
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Gudino

customer_reviews.title: Works just as good as the more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! My teeth are a little sensitive for continuous use of the included gel so I switched to my plus white gel from Walmart and it works just as good with no sensitivity. I drink coffee multiple times a day and this had my teeth white again within a week. The light will slip out of the mouthpiece if you move your head around to much but I use it just fine walking around while getting dressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: 2 treatments and seen results
customer_reviews.text: Elba... I have done 2 treatments of 30 min and I have seen a small difference. The only this I dislike but it’s not about the product it’s the drooling lol..! But good product and no sensitivity!
customer_reviews.author: ELBA LORENZO

customer_reviews.title: ... this teeth whitening kit I was a little unsure like most consumers
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased this teeth whitening kit I was a little unsure like most consumers. However, after reading previous reviews I decided to give it a shot. And I was definitely not disappointed. By the duration of the kit, my teeth were noticeably whiter concluding the fact I consume a lot of coffee and tea beverages. I love the kit, it is easy to use and the results are so worth it. if you don't want to spend $500 on professional teeth whitening I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and you can see the results right ...
customer_reviews.text: Cali White stole my heart! As a hygienist, I’m always curious about any new products, especially the whitening ones! Cali White takes the prize! I’ve tried several take home whitening kits but those always made my teeth extra sensitive..(which I didn’t like). Cali White is gentle, easy to use and you can see the results right in front of your eyes! I was completely amazed! Especially with the charcoal with coconut oil toothpaste! I was so impressed! Thank you Cali White for making such a great product, you get 5 stars in my book! Can’t wait to share with my patients!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Egas, RDH

customer_reviews.title: I hope it works
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I do not feel like it has worked at all, sucks cause I purchased refills since I received a coupon with my purchase. I will stick to baking soda to whiten my teeth. I didnt even put that much in the mouth piece and it burned my gums really bad, cant even brush my front teeth.
customer_reviews.author: 2blonde4983

customer_reviews.title: Does not cause tooth sensitivity!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product is vegan and cruelty free, it does not burn my gums of cause me to have sensitive teeth. The package is organized and there is a generous amount of whitening gel (two dispenser). -Toni I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective LED light, company won't respond. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.text: Light won't turn on which pretty much defeats the purpose of an LED whitening kit. Too late to return since I got it when I was pregnant and had to wait two months to I had the baby to use it. Reached out the the company asking for a replacement light and was totally ignored.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My dentist thought my teeth are whiter than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Derick Vinculado

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work at all
customer_reviews.text: After all treatments i dont see a difference at all its like im wasting my time and the blue light keeps falling out of the universal bite the design is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Speirs V.

customer_reviews.title: Painfully burned teeth in under a minute!
customer_reviews.text: Issue #1. This burned my teeth in less than a minute! I haven’t had mouth pain like this and I’ve broken a tooth off at the gum line before. Issue #2. I did not get all the pieces. The thermaform tray was missing. Issue #3. The case for the trays was cracked and almost complete broken at the hinge when product was unboxed. I will be returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: ND Gal

customer_reviews.title: Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty easy to use and no sensitivity. However after my first use, i noticed a white spot on my tooth. You can see it in the bottom picture to the right of my upper 2 front teeth. I’ve used other whitening treatments before and never had this issue. Super self conscious now and will not be using these again. :(
customer_reviews.author: A. England

customer_reviews.title: They didn't send all of the parts to complete the treatment
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful...... When I received my box, there was missng item. Actually the main part of the treatment was missing, the 5 LED Whitening Light W/Timer. Recommenation- Make sure all items are in the box before sending out. I'm sending this back....This has been a wasted of time
customer_reviews.author: SEG

customer_reviews.title: This really works! Use custom tray.
customer_reviews.text: Was delighted to find these really work! I read the reviews first and opted for the custom tray instead of the universal. I think that makes a difference so I recommend it. I also use it for 30 mins, 2 consecutive 15 min sessions. At least once a week but originally I did it 3 days in a row and saw results.
customer_reviews.author: Lynx724

customer_reviews.title: Meh! Crest white strips are better
customer_reviews.text: I tried this, and yeah it sort of works but its a LOT of hassle and set up compared to crest white strips that work as well (or better) as this. Then the light broke after about the 4th use. So.. i say save your money.
customer_reviews.author: James from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!! No pain!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first whitening product that has not made my teeth ache with agony after bleaching. The whitening strips always move around and only bleach the fronts. This kit is superior as it works on the entire mouth, without irritating the gums. I also love the accelerating light and that its timed, and you can reset for a longer session. Thanks Cali White!
customer_reviews.author: Brenton1985

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely amazed by this product. I’ve only done 4 treatments so far and there is already a huge improvement (see pictures- this is only 4 treatments!!). I have expirenced no sensitivity yet (I have also been using a remineralizing gel) and use the personal fit tray for 30 mins each time. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Works+No Pain+Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I found this product after watching an ad on hismile and thinking their price was a bit much. This gel is great and does not leave your teeth feeling sensitive, even if you do the max treatment time. Its super easy to use and not uncomfortable to wear for 10 minutes at a time. Lastly, you cannot beat the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Lash

customer_reviews.title: LED light broke before I could use up the whitening gel.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pretty pleased with this kit. It did whiten my teeth a couple shades, though my enamel felt veeeeeery soft and was very prone to staining for several days after each treatment. Due to increasing painful sensitivity, I wasn’t able to sustain daily treatments. A treatment every 3 days felt better and still showed significant whitening. I also started using a hydroxyapatite toothpaste and mineralizing mouth wash immediately after treatments and on the days afterward. Unfortunately, 7 treatments in the LED light completely and mysteriously stopped working. Of course it’s a few days after the return window, so looks like I’ll have to wait to finish the whitening kit until I find another brand of light.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Koi

customer_reviews.title: NO DIFFERENCE AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this for 10 days and so far there is little to no change and I say little because I would love to believe there is a change but when I compare my before and after pictures, there is no difference.. I really hoped this would work, guess I'll try a different brand. Two stars because at least I did not tasted bad nor left a bad taste on my mouth afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh ( smoker and coffee drinker here)
customer_reviews.text: So I was very skeptical that this product would even work. But let me say wow, I smoke and drink at least 2 cups of coffee a day (not to mention my teas ) and I use this in the mornings and before bed and it has definitely made a difference. Today is day 3 and wow. I would recommend to everyone. I also use their toothpaste too. * yes they aren’t perfectly white but the change is noticeable*
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Arnwine

customer_reviews.title: With personal teeth trays, your teeth will SPARKLE!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this twice with the universal mouthpiece and saw now results so I was skeptical to try a third time. I decided to mold out the personal mouthpieces and am SO glad I did because it obviously fits perfectly to your teeth so the gel works better. After a 30 minute treatment my teeth looked about 3 shades whiter! Highly recommend this product! Also no sensitivity and I have sensitive teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Missayaomar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to use this after reading all the great reviews especially about ppl who are sensitive to other whitening products...it saddens me to say my first use I had a horrible pain in my top front teeth after 3 min of wearing the gel I had to immediately go rinse my mouth and brush my teeth which sucks cause the next morning I saw a lil difference in the color of my teeth only in that short amount of time I had it on lol so this product clearly works but if you are sensitive to things in general like me be careful.
customer_reviews.author: ARIEL

customer_reviews.title: It Really Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: It really works. So my son made me get this and after some research I went with this.. 10 dollar off coupon I paid 25 dollars for it. He and I both tried it one time however we did the light for 20 mins. The results were amazing.. and so far I have no sensitivity. Amazing product and we didn't have to pay 50 or 60 dollars well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom_of_Six

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked super-well! My teeth are noticeably whiter!! I used the custom trays and was able to lighten for 30 minutes each night. I have sensitive teeth, but had absolutely no issues with tooth or gum sensitivity. I do use toothpaste for sensitive teeth, so maybe that helped. I highly recommend this whitening kit as it is far better than any strips or other kits I have tried. (And I have tried several.) I think the LED light helps as well. Love that I can just purchase renewal syringes of gel without having to buy a whole new kit.
customer_reviews.author: dianelib

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that really works. While there are other 35% peroxide kits out there, Cali White is a company that offers excellent customer service. I messed up one of the mouth trays and I contacted Cali White and they sent me a new one free of charge and 100% hassle-free. And to sweeten the deal, this is actually a really good price for a product that not only gives you 35% peroxide gels, but very comfortable moldable mouth trays, a universal tray, and an activator light. And the packaging is very nice. I know that is a little superficial, but it shows that they take pride in their product.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: My husband try this and the taste is horrible, and the mouth piece is soo hard to keep in your mouth and it hurts your jaw just trying to keep it there. He lasted 10 mins. When I tried it was maybe 3 before my jaw hurt to much!
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Extreme damage to your teeth
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product and after the second day of using it my teeth chipped off
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: it freakin works
customer_reviews.text: I have done everything..EVERYTHING.. to get my teeth not look so damn yellow. This is the first product that’s actually made them look somewhat white. I like the packaging and the fact that it’s vefan and made in the US. There’s just one con... when my tongue touches any of the gel solution while the lights on it has a burning senstation.
customer_reviews.author: eliana

customer_reviews.title: My time for a Great smile!
customer_reviews.text: I havenʻt used this yet! I Just used it today. Followed all the instructions. Went with the universal comfort for the 1st time. Brushed and flossed my teeth. Removed plastic tab front whitening light, put gel in trays. Connected the the light to trays, placed in my mouth. Pūshed start button and waited the 10 min. A bit of the gel dripped out. Next time I will run it the 3 cycles. Rinsed my mouth. And my teeth to me felt clean and Seemed alittle whiter. I will try it again in a couple days but longer! Not that difficult to use. I'm a coffee drinker so it may take awhile to reach my satisfaction!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Spiegelberg

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have much hope for this whitening system to work as it was so much cheaper then other systems but I'm happy to say I was wrong. My teeth are noticeably whiter. I still have some tea staining but they are much harder to see now. I would highly recommend using the custom fit trays and actually doing the hot water to mold them to your mouth. It made a big difference for me in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Smeeks24

customer_reviews.title: Definitely made my smile more white
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, it whitens your smile and is super simple to use. I noticed on my first day that 30 minutes with such a giant mouth piece in my mouth, I was a drooling mess. My tip is to do this while laying down, made it so much easier and I could relax during the process. I will say that my teeth were sensitive after every go though, but it the feeling would go away after a while. Overall, product does what it advertises as long as you follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy read instructions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on reviews and let me tell you I wasn’t dissatisfied. The kit comes with easy to understand instructions that walk you through all the steps. I like that it came with a universal mouth piece (which I use) and a custom fit one. My first attempt with the gel was kind of messy, but when it was time for the second treatment I knew what to expect. I like this whitening kit better than others I have used. I also like that the gel has kind of a minty flavor, as opposed to other whiteners that taste like paste. Sarah
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: So far, so great!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Cali White system in the mail and the packaging was perfect. I opened it up and all the pieces were there and not broken. I've read other reviews and they called it "flimsy", I highly disagree. Very high quality and it comes with directions. I feel those who had poor reviews of the quality, did not read the instructions. As for the taste, it doesn't taste "chemically" and doesn't have a bad aftertaste. I cannot comment on the effectiveness yet, but I will return with a follow on review. Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Fit my price budget and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about using a whitening product, worried about damage to teeth and if it would really work. I did a lot of research before purchasing this brand. It has been easy to use and I saw whitening the first evening of using it. I did the 3 times reset button for a total of 30 minutes. Each day I am seeing more whitening.
customer_reviews.author: Vern and Ardee

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions to see results
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions! I didn’t find the instructions until after my first treatment and I realize now why I did not see results. The instructions state not to eat or drink at least 2 hours after treatment as your teeth are temporarily more vulnerable to staining. My first treatment I ate before bed and I thought my teeth actually looked a little worse than before. I tried again but this time right before bed and noticed great results. After my third whitening try, I’ve noticed a massive improvement. I have not tried the custom thermal trays yet, but so far, I’m glad I’ve tried this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it's a process
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it for 2 days, but already see the results. Although it’s kind of annoying to sit with this thing in your mouth, the suggestion to watch Netflix and relax while it works is both clever and a good idea. The product didn’t hurt my teeth like a few reviewers said, but I did notice the white spots initially, but they faded away within a few hours. My only complaint is that the universal fit tray isn’t super comfortable and doesn’t fit that well. The tray doesn't fit in place and stay when attached to the light. But after I did a little trimming of the thermoform trays, and melted them to fit my mouth, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Cali White Vegan Teeth WHITENING KIT - Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm finally getting around to using and reviewing this product! I saw results in my first use, very happy with that. I left it in for 20 minutes the first time. One note, keep some tissue ready if you have a lot of saliva... I have had the same issue with regular whitening strips, so not a surprise to me. I haven't noticed a difference in sensitivity, which I have experienced with strips. I would definitely recommend this whitening kit. It's easy to use, easy to keep in, and really works!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bartleby

customer_reviews.title: Save your money- get your teeth whitened professionally
customer_reviews.text: So I gave this product a fair shot. I’ve had it for a month and I’ve used up both of the whitening gels. Not impressed with the quality of the whitening gel or the mouth piece. The thing constantly falls out of your mouth because it detaches from the mouth guard. I don’t notice a difference in the whiteness of my teeth but I did notice that it leaves little white spots on your teeth (other reviews mention this as well). I decided to stop using it so that I don’t damage my teeth and end up spending more at a dental office.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Samaniego

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Gums?
customer_reviews.text: Finally-a whitening product that works with sensitive gums! I used the product five days, morning and night, for at least 10 minutes each time. No gum sensitivity. With other whitening products, I would have to refrain from flossing at least a week since they would be in so much pain. I never needed to break with flossing with this! I’m ordering the refills to continue the whitening. The change really started to take place the fourth day. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: It was ok... nothing fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to order this because it had great reviews, but I was a little bit disappointed. I definitely saw results after the first day, so I was really excited about how white my smile would be after a week! After day 1, I didn't see any more drastic changes and at the end of the week, there was only a subtle difference. I will say, the taste was fine and there was absolutely no sensitivity, which is rare for me!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Not a big change
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a little disappointed in this item. I didn’t feel like it whitened my teeth at all. Even after 4 consistent uses, nothing really changed. My teeth were never super yellow to begin with, I had fairly white teeth to start so maybe it’s more of a drastic difference if you have more stained teeth but I couldn’t tell the difference. I was pleased with how it didn’t irritate my gums or make my teeth overly sensitive. I did use once for 20 minutes and it made my teeth sensitive to cold the next day more than usual so I would recommend sticking with the 10 minute increments.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite 😬
customer_reviews.text: Super effective teeth whitening. I noticed a difference after the first use (enough of a difference to feel like they were as white as I wanted them to end up) yet I continued seeing improvement after each subsequent use, way better results than I could have imagined for an at home whitening system. I was nervous about sensitivity but I haven’t had any for hot or colds! Definitely recommending it to all of my friends. I feel more confident smiling now so thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Not overly impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I used the basic mold that was provided. I measured the correct amount of gel for the first couple applications and used it for 20 min applications. I didn't noticed much of a change in the color of my teeth. I used extra gel for the remaining applications and noticed some difference. They should provide more whitening gel in the kit for better results.
customer_reviews.author: smm

customer_reviews.title: Litterly burned itself on one use.
customer_reviews.text: I used it once. The light kept flashing and dimming and then just turning off. I went to remove it to check my assembly of it, and the plastic broke off of it. Just like that. As I looked closer the lights had all burned out and left burn damage on the light. As an engineer, it is in my opinion this product is not made at all to be put in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: Fun but different
customer_reviews.text: The kit is great and a little fun. You have two trays one universal and another form fitting. In theory one kit can work for two people. Wearing the light is the odd part and you kind of feel silly doing so. The light attaches to your white tray. The plastic surgeon makes it feel like you are playing doctor and has the measurements you need to put the right amount of gel. If you don’t mind the extra steps and silliness of putting a light on your tray for 10-30 min this may be a fun option.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good whitening, but some sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this a few times due to sensitivity, but here is what I have experienced. 1. The non-custom tray is only worth your time if you have a much bigger mouth than I do. The gel wasn’t anywhere close to touching my teeth and it was pretty uncomfortable. 2. The custom tray is MUCH better. The instructions say you have to hold the light when using the custom trays, but I was able to keep it in my mouth without too much problem. They are thin enough that I was able to talk pretty well with just the top tray in. 3. Does seem to whiten pretty well, even with only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself as a last resort to getting my teeth whiter. This was a lightning deal on Amazon and it was the right price. The kit included instructions, a completely useless molded tray which shrunk immediately in hot water, a very uncomfortable universal tray, 2 syringes and, light and blue case. I decided to do a 30 min treatment my first time and the result was astonishing. Subsequent 30-minute treatments yielded in substantially whiter teeth. I even ordered the toothpaste. Am happy with the product. Less so with the trays.
customer_reviews.author: xQapla

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me, but great customer service and the product was high quality
customer_reviews.text: I think I might have just already had too white of teeth (they're pretty good already and I don't drink staining beverages) or the formula just might not work for me. They had great instructional videos though and the taste was fine, so I really liked trying the product. There customer service was phenomenal and they refunded me without a problem when I explained that I used it as directed and didn't get results. I highly recommend trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Yellowish teeth turn whiter after 3 days of use
customer_reviews.text: 3 days – 3 treatments. Used: 10-15 minutes each night and they are whiter already. I see great results in a such a short time. Certain discomfort is present when applied for the first time. My sensitive gums stayed sore after the first application, but it is getting easier to overcome the discomfort after the second and the third treatment. Also, some skills are needed to insert the tray. Definitely, I will continue to use this product and already checked the refill options that they offer.
customer_reviews.author: Alxbndr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but lacked whitening results for me
customer_reviews.text: I've used the product according to the directions, both for the 10 minute cycles and the 30 minute cycles, and in all honesty I do not see a difference in whitening. There's no gross flavor to the product, and it's definitely easy to use -- the blue light with timer fits securely in place, so I could perform chores, etc., while "whitenening" my teeth. But after a week, there's no difference. I'd return it, but feel weird because I've already used more than half of it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Ahl

customer_reviews.title: Results without tooth sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Saw results quickly and no pain/sensitivity like I get from even one use of the Crest whitestrips. I use the custom trays and the top is perfect but I had some trouble with molding the bottom one so definitely make sure it’s a tight fit before cutting off the tab. I also don’t need the full recommended amount of gel to cover my teeth so that translates to even more treatments. Overall, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with average expectations. I've tried whitening stuff in the past with mediocre results. HOWEVER this product really is a good as it says. After 2 applications I saw a noticable difference. The gel provided is more than enough, and the first couple times I didn't even use all of the recommended dose. I use it before bed while I'm binge watching a show so I don't even notice having this thing in my mouth. Easy to use, low maintenance, doesn't taste bad and it actually works. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I’ve noticed my teeth are whiter.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d try something else as I used to use the crest whitening strips but those made my teeth very sensitive. This one doesn’t leave that same uncomfortable sensitive feeling afterwards, but it does make my teeth feel brittle for a short while after. I saw a review saying it makes you drool and create a lot of saliva, which is true. It makes it a little hard to keep in for 10 minutes. With that being said it has made my teeth whiter and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about how well this would work but I figured for the price I’d give it a try. I was trying to get me teeth whiter for my wedding. And it actually worked. I did once a day for 20-30 minutes for 2 weeks and it significantly whitened my teeth. With very little gum irritation. The moldable trays work much better than generic trays. Will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Werner

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: After my first cleaning I was very surprised!! I used this product as per instructions and my teeth were noticeably whiter. And my husband noticed it. I have only used this twice and my teeth look so much whiter. I am going to use it again today. Easy to use. I would highly recommend this product. It did not bother my teeth or gums in the least! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yana I.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, definitely not a quick fix
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a week. 10 mins at a time right before bed just as instructed. I have not seen any improvement in the color of my teeth. One thing I really liked about the kid, though, is the moldable teeth trays they provide. The instructions were spot on and I was pretty impressed how well it worked and fit. I will be continuing to use this until I run out of gel, hoping to see some result. I will update my review then.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Navarre

customer_reviews.title: Great Blue light and mouth piece
customer_reviews.text: The whitening treatment did not last long. Never bought again. I still use the mouth piece and blue light with other affordable whitening products you can buy at WalMart.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Michael

customer_reviews.title: Whiter without sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice so far and can actually see a noticeable difference! It seems to more effective than the white strips I've used in the past and doesn't cause the sensitivity issues. I don't use it everyday and would recommend using a toothpaste for sensitivity while using it!
customer_reviews.author: ms_mindi

customer_reviews.title: Safety Problem
customer_reviews.text: When I purchase something that I am putting in my mouth or on my skin, I expect it to have a safety seal. The box was not sealed and the syringes inside were not sealed. Not cool. In addition, the mouthpiece was clunky and uncomfortable. The light device seemed cheap.
customer_reviews.author: My Dog Loves Me

customer_reviews.title: DON’T SAVE FOR LATER
customer_reviews.text: I got this at the beginning of June and used a full syringe. I saved the second for this week because I’m going on a trip and it clearly went bad, it actually made my whole mouth numb and tasted sour when it was an unused syringe. So I feel like I wasted half my money. Also when using the first syringe I didn’t notice that great of results but I would say definitely do longer than 10 minutes! Also the trays are extremely annoying and would have to remove to spit all the time.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I was really scared about finding a safe whitening product with all my food allergies and sensitivities. I felt really safe about choosing this one. It surprised me how well it whitened too. I thought I might have to compromise on whiteness but it is wonderful. Will be staying with this company in the future. Thank you! #vegan #foodallergies #foodallergyawareness #glutenfree #milkfree
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't whiten my teeth. The universal tray was easy enough to use, but I would have expected to see some results after using it nightly for 10 days. The expiration date on the box is in a few months so maybe it was going bad? I'd like to give them the benefit of the doubt, but I'm bummed that it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: scm625

customer_reviews.title: The gag reflux is real!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be reviewing this post after using longer....if I make it. While I haven’t noticed “much” difference after two uses, I can assure you of one solid fact: this product will kick your gag reflex into overdrive. Update.... Couldn’t handle it and had to return. The mouthpiece is just so big it would gag me every....single....time. Cannot speak to how it works since I was never really able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sewing Fool

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally shocked! I admit I was skeptical on if this would really work. I’ve used It everyday for a week and my teeth are white as Hollywood stars! I used for 30 min a day before bed. Only side effect was a little gun sensitivity but nothing terrible! I’ve already recommended to my aunt after she saw my results. I’m impressed! Update - months later I get compliments on my teeth all the time! I use the kit once a week for maintenance. I’ve referred 5 people to this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Catzva

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Photo is before and after 6 treatments. I did the full 30 minutes with the light for each. Pros: obviously it works to whiten Inexpensive Cons: The flavor was just okay Causes some discomfort if you don’t get the excess off your gums The custom fit tray doesn’t really get a superb fit, even after following directions and repeating a few times. Overall, a good value for the price if you don’t want to do professional whitening.
customer_reviews.author: r_baum_

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: So far I am only on day 2 of whitening my teeth with this product and I already see two shades difference. I use it at night before bed. My teeth are sensitive and feel no pain with this whitening system, which is surprising to me. I have been taking pictures of me teeth each morning to compare results. It really works on my teeth. I can't wait to see the results after 10 days. I will update at the end of 10 days with my final thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: EGYPTIANTAMI

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I am avid coffee lover and have been so for years. I am 34 years old, so those stains have been there for awhile. The picture was only after 1- 10 minute treatment!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Shocking results!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth are the whitest they have ever been, and I thought they were ok before! The taste isn’t great, but it’s not awful either. The universal tray fit me just fine, and I don’t see why it wouldn’t work fine for most people. I think what I like most about this thing is that it produces really fast results with zero sensitivity. I’ve tried whitening strips in the past, but I could only suffer through for so long before my mouth was in a ton of pain. I will be reordering refills from this company as needed!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It’s affordable price and gets the job done. I’m a huge coffee, tea, and wine drinker so this is perfect for that extra bright smile. Plus I’ve been tanning in tanning beds for a couple years so I’ve tied lots of self teeth whitening products. This is awesome and the molding mouth gaurd tray is even better. After the first use of 10 mins, you could tell he difference.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with no pain
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't whitened my teeth in a few years and decided it was time to try it again. I was wary as the last time I did it, it was incredibly painful and the strips tasted awful. I spent a lot of time comparing products and reading reviews, and I'm so glad I decided to try this one. My husband think's it's hilarious when I'm using it, but it works and is pain-free. I noticed a difference after the first use, and I'm excited to see how much better my teeth look after the 10 days. I recommended this kit to all of my friends, and if you're on the fence, definitely try this one.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It truly works!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly write reviews but after too many coffee cups and failed attempts with other products, in particular, whitening strips. This stuff works! I like how it came with 2 different mouth pieces, one will mold your teeth and the other is "universal". I recommend following the directions and molding your teeth with the guard. I did 30 minutes on my first session and saw IMMEDIATE results. Yes, it taste a bit funny but its worth the price. I repeated it 3 days and my smile is noticeably whiter. Overall, i'm pleased at the cost and quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing research to find the best LED lighting whitening system. Being an avid coffee and wine drinker my teeth just weren't as white as I'd wanted. I found Cali White right here on Amazon and after reading the reviews, I purchased it. I could already notice a difference after the first use. It's beyond easy to use, does not have an awful taste, and really whitens your teeth. I am so happy I made this purchase and will always recommend this product to anyone looking for a pearly white smile.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying several different whitening products that taste horrible and I have to say this one I feel work so well because I am not disgusted by this taste! This works so well because its so easy to use and can truly use it while laying in bed, typing a paper or even preparing for an evening out. The simplicity of it is another great feature and why I really like this product. I also think that this really does whiten your teeth nicely. I noticed a difference after 4 times of doing it for the recommended time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: So far this kit is awesome!! I only gave it 4 stars because I haven’t used it enough times to tell a huge difference, but there was definitely a difference after the two times I have used it. Super easy to use and comfortable if you use the universal trays so you don’t have to hold the light. Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: ashli

customer_reviews.title: VERY WHITE NO SENSITIVITY
customer_reviews.text: This whitening system is very simple and way less messy than strips or some of the other trays. I have used both, the custom tray and the regular one. I like the regular one personally. My teeth are at least 5 shades whiter and I haven't finished it yet. I'm so happy. Also my teeth aren't sensitive like they have been with other products. I couldn't be more satisfied. You won't regret getting this it's worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything this whitening kit comes with and this is why i decided to try it out. I was curious about this product because it claims it is vegan, and i was wondering how it compares to non vegan products. I've used it once so far and like the improvement is has made thus far. Obviously it is multiuse so i am curious and excited to see how it may improve after using it more. I do not have a sensitive sensation which is really important.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: Taste nasty .. I used once and can see a difference!! Was so affordable and comes with two mouth pieces and the light batteries and two whitening jels awsome . I've looked at several 100 different ones and this one was the best and i can't believe i only paid 25 $ for it when similar ones cost 50-100$ and no add ons like the jell or the two mouth guards and u usually have too buy batteries as well 100% satisfaction!!! Love it Even has a case for it 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amy Herman

customer_reviews.title: Best whitening for sensitive teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice so far and am seeing a good difference! I can’t wait to finish both tubes. I don’t like how the non-custom tray fits and am going to make the custom trays today. The flavor of the whitening gel isn’t amazing, but you’re not supposed to be tasting it anyways. I also have somewhat sensitive teeth and do not notice much of a difference in that.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it would be super messy and that it might hurt my teeth (as other whitening products have done). No pain whatsoever and the standard trays fit adequately. I've not yet finished the entire treatment so I can't yet rate how effective it is. I do wish there were markings on the syringes so I knew how much to use. The packaging is super cute and the retainer case is nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LushLover

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Due to my overwhelming love for coffee, I seriously needed this whitening kit for my yellowish teeth. After a few uses in the week I've had it, I do think it's helping. The mouth guard is easy to use with simple instructions, the gel does not irritate my sensitive gums, doesn't have a weird taste, and the blue light looks super cool. It is a bit messy due to the drooling but it's to be expected. I will continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: gingc

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have found this product!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my kit and after one use I can see a difference. Excited and had to share! My teeth aren't heavily stained, (just typical yellowing from age and coffee maybe) so maybe that's helping see results already. Yeah!!! Can't wait to do a few more treatments and I'll be summer ready! I decided to try this product because of the light it comes with and I think it really does boost it. I also liked that it was a smaller business to support (and California based like me) and seemed like the healthiest version of teeth whitening that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am halfway through my treatments and I can already see a difference in my teeth! The kit is very easy to use and the instructions are easy to follow. When using this, you need to make sure that you are leaning back instead of a little bit forward (if you are trying to do other things) because some saliva will come out, but that is definitely the same for other products like this. So as long as you just lean back and sit on the couch or something you would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Before and after 3 treatments
customer_reviews.text: Great product, whitens great, tastes ok and pretty straightforward. I've never used teeth whitening before so this is the first kit I've ever bought. I used to be a heavy smoker and decided to quit cold turkey and I've been cigarette free for about a year, brushing just didn't seem to be helping with the staining at all so my search began. Now the first use wasn't the best experience because the gel burned the top of my mouth and gum line but since then it has not burned at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Helton

customer_reviews.title: ineffective product
customer_reviews.text: I didnt know this was possible, but im convinced my teeth may have gotten more yellow! i followed instructions to a T and as seen in the pictures, i dont really see any type of change. after this experience, i decided to purchase crest white strips in the hopes that i will see changes soon.
customer_reviews.author: madison

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because of all the great reviews, but my experience is totally different. The moment I put the light on my gum was on fire. I still maintain it for the whole ten minutes hoping the burning will go away but no improvements. After rinsing and brushing my teeth the burning sensation stopped but my teeth were left with white patches and extremely sensitive. some people say the patches fade but its been 3days now and my teeth are still very sensitive and patchy. Its extremely embarrassing. Don't waste your time and money. My teeth were not too bad I just wanted them looking better, I should have just be satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Something that works!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the worst luck with strips and whitening kits from the dentist. I read about this on BuzzFeed and thought I’d give it a try. Not only does it work fast, but I haven’t had any reactions to the gel, bravo!! Just ordered my first refill. The picture is after 4 treatments with tea stained teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Works, but uncomfortable as hell
customer_reviews.text: Definitely see a difference in my teeth now that I've finished my tenth session. The problem is, I would NEVER repurchase this because the mouth piece is so damn uncomfortable. It's SOO bulky and hurts my mouth just keeping it in. Most uncomfortable "universal fit" mouthpiece I have ever used. I 100% prefer the auraglow ones and will go back to that and just buy the caliwhite gel. Recommend the product if you have a big mouth LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this kit. I have a crown on one of my front teeth and was worried about getting too white or weird looking. But it's a controllable process. I've done two days so far and I can see a big difference, and I think I can do another day or two and not whiten it past my crown (ran with a metal baseball bat as a kid, kids are dumb). I've had a small bit of sensitivity but nothing too bad. I have already recommended this kit to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Clarisse G.

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it made no difference.
customer_reviews.text: Product made no difference in the whiteness of my teeth, despite following the directions exactly. Some people described that it burned their gums. I did not experience any sensitivity or adverse feelings / taste. Very hard to keep the gel on the teeth without saliva filling the mouth guards, even after molding. May have worked for others, but it was just a pipe dream for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cali White Vegan Teeth WHITENING KIT with LED Light, Made in USA, Natural & Organic Peroxide Gel, Professional Dental Whitener, Best Home System: 2 X 5mL Syringes, Custom Trays, Retainer Case
feature_bullets: 🌎 🇺🇸MADE IN USA - VEGAN - NO GMO - KOSHER - GLUTEN FREE - NO PEG & PPG - NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS - NO SULFATES OR PARABENS - CERTIFIED ORGANIC INGREDIENTS - DENTIST APPROVED

🎬 😁THE COMEBACK STORY OF YOUR SMILE - CLINICALLY PROVEN RESULTS- Removes stains from coffee, wine, tea, and smoking. Professional Results in as fast as 1 treatment. Experience a 2-8 Shade Whiter Smile in 7 days with our enamel safe 35% Carbamide Peroxide Formula. With Low Sensitivity Serum included.

🍿 👑NETFLIX AND WHITEN (or Amazon Prime ha) - Get those pearly whites in the time it takes to watch half of a Game of Thrones episode. Convenience is King (or Queen), just pop the tray in your mouth and hit the light button and chill. Wear from 10-30 minutes a day for 7-10 days for full whitening results.

🏆SUPERIOR TO WHITENING STRIPS, PENS, AND TOOTHPASTES - Our patented Universal Comfort fit Tray and BONUS Custom Thermoform trays provide full upper and lower bite coverage. The Cali White System allows gel to fill crevices between teeth as well as whitening molars giving a uniform whitening effect on all teeth.

👑 💡DELUXE VERSION WITH ALL THE GOODS INCLUDED - 5X Bright Blue LED Light w/built in Timer - 2X 5ml 35% Carbamide Peroxide Gel Syringes - 2X BONUS Thermaform Custom Mouthpiece Tray - 1X Patented Universal Comfort Fit Tray - Stylish Tropical Palm Tree Case
